content: Because of the knight's unusual way of hopping around the board, beginners are often taken by surprise and find themselves the victims of a knight's fork.
translations: ita:A causa del modo insolito del cavallo di saltare sulla scacchiera, i principianti sono spesso colti di sorpresa e finisc
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
